headline: Looking Ahead to the Q4 Earnings Season
summary: For 2024 Q4, total S&P 500 earnings are expected to be up +7.5% on +4.7% higher revenues, continuing the recent growth streak. But what else should investors look out for during the period?

headline: Here's Why Roku Stock Unexpectedly Jumped Today
summary: Shares of connected TV platform company Roku (NASDAQ: ROKU) jumped Wednesday morning after Needham analyst Laura Martin said she believes that Roku will be acquired at a hefty premium in 2025.  As of 11:30 a.m. ET, Roku stock was up by 10.5%.  Likely in response, Walmart decided to acquire Roku rival Vizio, a deal that closed Tuesday.

raw.headline: Here's Why Roku Stock Unexpectedly Jumped Today
raw.summary: Shares of connected TV platform company Roku (NASDAQ: ROKU) jumped Wednesday morning after Needham analyst Laura Martin said she believes that Roku will be acquired at a hefty premium in 2025.  As of 11:30 a.m. ET, Roku stock was up by 10.5%.  Likely in response, Walmart decided to acquire Roku rival Vizio, a deal that closed Tuesday.

headline: Why Walmart Stock Jumped 13% in November
summary: Walmart (NYSE: WMT) stock gained 13% in November according to data from S&P Global Market Intelligence.  Walmart is the largest company in the world by sales, so it's all the more impressive that it can keep building on top of that.  It is constantly upgrading its stores and platforms with new product lines, expense management, new ventures, and more.
